pullRequest.title: Constructor injection
pullRequest.bodyText:
commit 6448766
Update Injections.java javadoc

- give more details on what it is used from, basically it is a DIY IOC
- be more explicit about avoiding singleton "pattern" and static coupling

commit 90d524b
Replace static usage of 'Injections.getInsance().getXXX' with constructor injection

commit.message:
Update Injections.java javadoc

- give more details on what it is used from, basically it is a DIY IOC
- be more explicit about avoiding singleton "pattern" and static coupling
Replace static usage of 'Injections.getInsance().getXXX' with constructor injection

nodes.bodyText: To point out, 'new' calls are grouped together and object construction is now done in fewer places. This removes two examples of static coupling: 1) invoking 'new' from within a constructor body, and 2) invoking 'Injections.getInstance()' from within a constructor body.
